verses.roman:
kṛpā kari' more ājñā deha' dui-jana
janme-janme sevoṅ raghunāthera caraṇa

synonyms: kṛpā kari'-being merciful; more—unto me; ājñā deha'-give the order; dui-jana—both of you; janme-janme—life after life; sevoṅ—let me serve; raghunāthera caraṇa—the lotus feet of Lord Raghunātha.
translation: " 'Both of you please be merciful to me and order me in such a way so that life after life I may serve the lotus feet of Lord Raghunātha.
